mapper.insert: insert into moim_board ( moim_board_no, moim_no, member_email, member_nick, moim_board_title, moim_board_content, moim_board_category, moim_board_time ) values( #{moimBoardNo}, #{moimNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNick}, #{moimBoardTitle}, #{moimBoardContent}, #{moimBoardCategory}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from moim_board order by moim_board_no desc
mapper.update:
update moim_board
moim_board_title = #{moimBoardTitle},
moim_board_content = #{moimBoardContent},
moim_board_category = #{moimBoardCategory},
where moim_board_no = #{moimBoardNo}
mapper.select:
